label: 検断権
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: The right of jurisdiction in criminal matters. This privilege included right of pursuit, incarceration, judgment, and confiscation. It could be divided among local authorities and central proprietary interests on any basis: by type of crime, by terriorial boundaries, or by percentage of any fines levied.
